amendment.description: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to reduce Unfunded Priority Lists to only the six Service Branches of the United States Military and United States Special Operations Command.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce Unfunded Priority Lists to only the six Service Branches of the United States Military and United States Special Operations Command.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A022) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A022) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Schrader.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A022) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 283).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Schrader amendment (A022) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 167 - 256 (Roll no. 283).
